title: Small Homes (Up to 1,200 sq. ft.)
description: A furnace with a capacity of 40,000 to 60,000 BTUs is generally suitable for smaller homes. It efficiently heats without overworking.

title: Medium Homes (1,200 to 2,000 sq. ft.)
description: For mid-sized homes, a furnace with 60,000 to 90,000 BTUs will usually meet heating needs comfortably and economically.

title: Large Homes (2,000 to 3,000 sq. ft.)
description: Larger homes typically require a furnace with a capacity of 90,000 to 120,000 BTUs to ensure every room stays warm, even in colder weather.

title: Extra-Large Homes (3,000 sq. ft. or more)
description: Homes with over 3,000 square feet may need a furnace with more than 120,000 BTUs to provide consistent warmth throughout.
